body_html:
@yubeic I can confirm that PyTorch is working fine with 4 GPUs on 1950x/1920x when setting iommu=soft (or off). However, we were unable to install Ubuntu 16.04 LTS due to unknown kernel issues; only 17.10 is working :( Hopefully 18.04 will install without problems. I have the 1700 W power supply from Enermax, but the PCI-E cables are a bit short.
I use the Asus ROG Zenith mainboard (can recommend), which has 2x EPS 12V power delivery for the CPU. Look for a power supply that has two of these CPU cables in case you also have a board with two connectors (I think all threadripper boards have two).

I would be interested with what build you come up with in the end.
